pages.title: The Basics
pages.text: Yes, your enemies have levels too. The further from spawn, the higher their levels are. So don't go running far from spawn when you're low level! Gear has level requirements so even if you could kill the high level mobs, you still won't be able to make use of the loot.

pages.title: More info
pages.text: As so many things are configurable, you want to check with your modpack first. Generally modpacks will make different dimensions have different level ranges. So maybe nether will have level 20-30 mobs, and end lvl 30-40 mobs etc.
